sourcesContent:
List of Contributors({{viewTitle}} View)

Filtered by: {{listFilter}}
Contributor Id Contributor Name Contributor collections
{{ contributor.contributorId }} {{ contributor.name }} {{ contributor.collections.collectionName}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { IContributor } from './contributor'; import { HttpClient } from "@angular/common/http"; import { Router } from "@angular/router"; import { ContributorService } from "./contributors.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-contributors-component', templateUrl: './contributors.component.html', styles: ['thead {color: blue;}'] }) export class ContributorsComponent implements OnInit { viewTitle: string = 'Table' displayImage: boolean = true; contributors: IContributor[] = []; constructor(private _contributorService: ContributorService, private _http: HttpClient, private _router: Router) { } private _listFilter: string = ''; get listFilter(): string { return this._listFilter; } set listFilter(value: string) { this._listFilter = value; console.log('In setter:', value) this.filteredContributors = this.performFilter(value); } getContributors(): void { this._contributorService.getContributors().subscribe(data => { console.log('All', JSON.stringify(data)); console.log() this.contributors = data; this.filteredContributors = this.contributors; }) } deleteContributor(contributor: IContributor): void { const confirmDelete = confirm(`Are you sure you want to delete "${contributor.name}"?`); if (confirmDelete) { this._contributorService.deleteContributor(contributor.contributorId) .subscribe( (response) => { if (response.success) { console.log(response.message); this.filteredContributors = this.filteredContributors.filter(i => i !== contributor); // Update contributors this.getContributors(); } }, (error) => { console.error('Error deleting contributor', error); }); } } filteredContributors: IContributor[] = this.contributors; performFilter(filterBy: string): IContributor[] { filterBy = filterBy.toLowerCase(); console.log("Performing filter on ", this.filteredContributors) return this.contributors.filter((contributors: IContributor) => contributors.name.toLowerCase().includes(filterBy)); } toggleImage(): void { this.displayImage = !this.displayImage; } navigateToContributorform() { this._router.navigate(['/contributorform']) } ngOnInit(): void { console.log('ContributorConponent created'); this.getContributors(); } }
